atmosphere_notes: Midpoint transformation. Kessa's sacrifice shown as both loss and necessity. Three consciousnesses (human, Gardener, hybrid) illustrated before merger. Exhaustion and desperation driving choice for immediate transformation over slow dissolution. Philosophical discussion of identity, pattern, symphony. Merger portrayed as mutual transformation not consumption. Shepherd emerges with unified awareness. Sage's grief honoring Kessa while accepting Shepherd. Processing power now sufficient for perfect coordination. Two-year timeline creates second-half urgency. Tone: transcendence through sacrifice, hope through transformation, grief at necessary loss.

continuity_notes.timeline_check: Day 4,110 = 760 days after Ch7 (Day 3,350) = 25 months ≈ 2 years. Stated as 'two years into evacuation.' Consistent. Four-year timeline from Ch7 means two years remaining. Midpoint of evacuation.
continuity_notes.evacuation_math: 27,000 total to evacuate. 13,000 done in 2 years = 6,500/year average. 14,000 remaining in 2 years = 7,000/year needed. Acceleration required, explains pressure.
continuity_notes.consciousness_integration: Ch7: 34% integrated. Ch12: 67% integrated. 15 months = 33% increase. Progression rate consistent. Full merger accelerates final 33% to immediate.
continuity_notes.contamination_progression: Ch7: 0% explicitly. Ch12: 1.7%. Four years to 3%. Linear: 0.75%/year. Observed: 1.7% in 2 years = 0.85%/year. Slight acceleration, consistent with cascade.
continuity_notes.character_arcs: Kessa: 1.35 → 1.60 (transformation to Shepherd, individual sacrifice). Gardener: 0.90 → merged (accepted transformation). Sage: 0.85 → 0.95 (grief + acceptance). Shepherd: new entity at 0.60 arc (middle of journey).
